title: COVID-19 Vaccine Information for Providers
sitename: COVID-19 Vaccine Information for Providers : Oregon Health Authority
cleaned_text: Training Programs and Reference Materials for Healthcare Professionals Oregon Provider COVID-19 Office Hours Are you a provider with questions about administering the COVID-19 vaccine? At each office hour session, an immunization staff member will provide a brief update and take provider questions (they may not have an immediate answer; thanks in advance for your patience). Contact the [VFC Help Desk](mailto:vfc.help@dhsoha.state.or.us) with name of attendee and clinic/organization for log-in information. COVID-19 Vaccine Office Hours - every Monday 12:00pm - 1:00pm The following days are state holidays - no meeting held: Jan. 16, 2023 Feb. 20, 2023 May 29, 2023 Jun. 19, 2023 Jul. 3, 2023 (not a state holiday) Jul. 4, 2023 Sept. 4, 2023 Dec. 25, 2023
